mapper.select: select pro_title as proTitle, pro_progress as proProgress from project where pro_no=(select post_pro_no from post where post_no=#{postNo})

select post_no as postNo, post_title as postTitle, post_progress as postProgress, post_date as postDate, post_content as postContent, post_writer as postWriter, post_temp as postTemp, post_pro_no as postProNo, post_Tag as postTag from post where post_no = #{postNo}

select todo_no as todoNo, todo_post_no as todoPostNo, todo_pro_no as todoProNo, todo_title as todoTitle, todo_content as todoContent, todo_writer as todoWriter, todo_member astodoMember, todo_start_date as todoStartDate, todo_end_date astodoEndDate, todo_progress as todoProgress, (select member_name from member where member_no=todo_writer) as todoWriterName, (select member_name from member where member_no=todo_member) as todoMemberName, (select member_picture from member where member_no=todo_member) as todoMemberPicture from todo where todo_post_no=#{postNo}
select member_no as memberNo, member_name as memberName from work_on join member using (member_no) where pro_no=(select post_pro_no from post where post_no=#{postNo})
select member_no as memNO, sc_start_date as startDate, sc_end_date as endDate, sc_title as scTitle from schedule where post_no = #{postNo}

select dc_writer as dcWriter, dc_maker as dcMaker, dc_content as dcContent, dc_yn as dcYn, dc_decision as dcDecision, dc_comment as dcComment, (select member_name from member where member_no=dc_writer) as dcWriterName, (select member_name from member where member_no=dc_maker) as dcMakerName from decision where dc_Post_No=#{postNo}
mapper.insert: insert into schedule values(schedule_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{postNo},#{memNO},(select post_pro_no from post where post_no=#{postNo}),#{startDate},#{endDate},#{scTitle})
insert into todo values(todo_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{todoPostNo},(select post_pro_no from post where post_no=#{todoPostNo}),#{todoTitle},#{todoContent},#{todoWriter},#{todoMember},SYSDATE,SYSDATE,'')
mapper.select: select member_name as memberName, member_picture as memberPicture from member where member_no=#{memberNo}
mapper.update: update decision set dc_yn='Y', dc_decision=#{dcDecision}, dc_comment=#{dcComment} where dc_post_no=#{dcPostNo}
update post set post_progress=#{postProgress} where post_no=#{postNo}
update todo set todo_progress=#{todoProgress} where todo_no=#{todoNo}
